title: Rajakumari Bead Haaram: Emerald & Polki Statement Necklace
materials: Green Onyx Beads. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: A striking bead haaram with a cascading multi-strand design. The centerpiece showcases a large emerald surrounded by uncut Polki diamonds, pearls, and ruby accents. Delicate gold filigree and floral motifs adorn the strands, adding to the piece's regal charm. Individual strands are finished with gold and polki bead caps accenting amethyst, sapphire, and onyx faceted stones.
colors: and the warm glow of 22K gold.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions like weddings (Vivah)
and festive celebrations such as Dussehra or Diwali. Perfectly complements silk sarees and traditional attire.
description: A true statement piece exuding elegance and tradition. The combination of precious gemstones and intricate goldwork showcases exceptional craftsmanship. The unique color palette blends traditional aesthetics with modern appeal, ensuring you stand out in any gathering. This haaram is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom to be cherished for generations.
